title: Becoming a Clutter-Free Family, Part 4
itunes:author: John Fuller & Danny Huerta
itunes:summary: Many of us are blessed to be able to just go down to the corner store and get the things we need, like plastic bins to try to keep things organized, but sometimes the problem is that we just have too much stuff. John and Danny show how kids need to learn how to be content with what they have because when parents give them everything they want, often that stuff just adds to clutter around the house.
